job_description: Analyst - Data Solutions : SEBPO Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List SEBPO Analyst - Data Solutions Application Deadline : 05 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 40 Age: 22 to 35 years Location: Dhaka (Mohakhali) Salary: Tk. 16000 - 18000 (Monthly) Published: 03 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements Age 22 to 35 years Basic computer skills with good command of English reading and understanding. Ability to summarize and analyze English articles effectively. Attention to detail with a focus on accuracy. This is NOT a technical role related to Data Science, Programming, Statistics, or Database Management. Responsibilities & Context 09 hours per day. Weekly 02 days holiday + 05 working days on a roster basis (03 Shifts). The role primarily involves research, reading, reviewing, and summarizing content. Applicants with strong English comprehension and analytical abilities are encouraged to apply. Analyzing English news articles and aggregating relevant information. Reviewing and cross-matching demographic information from various sources and identifying potential matches. Conduct online research and due diligence tasks. This role requires flexibility to work in rotational shifts (Morning: 7:00 AM – 4:00 PM, Evening: 1:00 PM – 10:00 PM, Night: 10:00 PM – 7:00 AM). Skills & Expertise Communication in English Computer Literacy Content Research Data analysis Data Management Statistical Data Analysis Suggested by Content Research Data analysis Data Management Statistical Data Analysis Compensation & Other Benefits Weekly 2 holidays,Insurance Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Training period 03 months. Training allowance BDT. 11,000 per month (for 03 months). Scope for overtime and holiday duty allowance. Life insurance, medical insurance, and discounts on diagnostics. Unlock an additional BDT. 3,000 after confirmation as a performance bonus for achieving targets. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Mohakhali) Job Highlights SEBPO is a global outsourcing partner specializing in Ad Operations, Data Solutions, Creative and Software services. Recognized among the USA`s 5000 Fastest Growing Private Companies and named a Top Global Outsourcing Company by IAOP. Read Before Apply This role requires flexibility to work in rotational shifts ( Morning: 7:00 AM - 4:00 PM, Evening: 1:00 PM - 10:00 PM, Night: 10:00 PM - 7:00 AM ). Candidates applying must have completed their undergraduate degree, honors, or bachelor`s program . Company Information SEBPO Follow More jobs from this company Address: SEBPO, Level 7, Monem Business District, 111, Bir Uttam C.R. Dutta Road, Karwan Bazar, Dhaka-1205. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements নুন্যতম সংশ্লিষ্ট কাজে অভিজ্ঞ প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে।শক্তিশালী যোগাযোগ দক্ষতা এবং মানুষের সাথে ভালো সম্পর্ক স্থাপনের ক্ষমতা।স্মাটফোন ব্যবহারে সক্ষম হতে হবে। বিশেষ দ্রষ্টব্য: নারী ও পুরুষ উভয়েই এই পদের জন্য আবেদন করতে পারবেন। চাকুরির জন্য কোনো ধরনের সিকিউরিটি টাকা বা চেক জমা দেওয়ার প্রয়োজন নেই। Responsibilities & Context কনট্রিভেন্স টেকনোলজি আওতায় ইসলামী ব্যাংক বাংলাদেশ পিএলসি-এর অনুমোদিত এমক্যাশ (mCash) পরিবেশকের তত্ত্বাবধানে, নিজ এলাকায় চাকরির সুযোগ দেওয়া হচ্ছে। আগ্রহী, উদ্যমী এবং যোগ্যতাসম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের নিম্নলিখিত পদে আবেদনের জন্য আহ্বান করা হচ্ছে। কাজের স্থান: নিজ এলাকা দায়িত্ব ও কর্তব্য: নিজ এলাকায় এমক্যাশ (mCash) সেবা প্রদান করে প্রয়োজনীয় প্রচার ও প্রসার করা। নতুন এমক্যাশ গ্রাহক তৈরি এবং এজেন্ট নিয়োগে সহায়তা করা। গ্রাহকদের মোবাইল ব্যাংকিং সুবিধা, যেমন: টাকা জমা ও উত্তোলন, ফান্ড ট্রান্সফার, বিল পেমেন্ট ইত্যাদি সম্পর্কে অবহিত করা। ঊর্ধ্বতন কর্তৃপক্ষের নির্দেশনা অনুযায়ী লক্ষ্যমাত্রা অর্জন করা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Field Work Sales & Marketing Client Service/ Marketing Compensation & Other Benefits বেতন ও সুযোগ-সুবিধা:মাসিক বেতন: বেসিক ও টিএ/ডিএ (TA/DA) সহ মোট ২৩,০০০/- টাকা মাসিক ফিক্সড বেতন (টার্গেট পূরণ সাপেক্ষে)। টার্গেট অর্জনের ভিত্তিতে আকর্ষণীয় ইনসেনটিভ বা কমিশন পাওয়ার সুযোগ রয়েছে। পরিবেশকের  নিয়ম অনুযায়ী অন্যান্য সুবিধা প্রদান করা হবে। Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dinajpur, Nilphamari, Panchagarh, Thakurgaon Read Before Apply আবেদন প্রক্রিয়া:

Production Monitoring (Inline/Final Inspection): Conducting regular in-line, end-line, and final audits (based on AQL) to check, workmanship, measurements, and finishing quality. Corrective Actions & Reporting: Identifying, documenting, and communicating quality issues to factory management and buying house merchants to implement immediate, corrective actions. Factory Compliance & Support: Ensuring factories follow, quality SOPs and safety regulations. Supplier Quality Management: Training factory staff (GPQ) and, evaluating vendor performance to maintain high standards. We work on design supplied by the customer as well as we also provide our own design to many internationally reputable customers. Ours aspiration is to provide the best quality product to our valued customers. For every garment, we pays maximum attention to yarn/ material selection, fitting and perfect quality. (Concern of Confidence Group) Engineer, Operations Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Competency Requirements Technical Competencies Strong knowledge of HFO-based power plant operations. Hands-on experience with engine sets, STG, WHRB, substations, and auxiliary systems. Ability to analyse operational data and equipment performance trends. Knowledge of electrical systems including HV/MV/LV operations. Behavioural & Professional Competencies Strong sense of responsibility and accountability. Honest, hardworking, and dependable. Team-oriented with a friendly and cooperative attitude. Ability to work under pressure and during shift duties. Communication Competencies Effective verbal and written communication skills in Bangla and English. Ability to coordinate clearly with internal teams and external stakeholders (e.g., NLDC). IT & Reporting Competencies Proficient in Microsoft Office tools (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint). Familiar with Google Docs, Sheets, and digital reporting tools. Capable of preparing structured operational and MIS reports. Responsibilities & Context Job Purpose To ensure the safe, reliable, and economical operation of the power plant by efficiently managing shift operations, operating plant equipment, maintaining accurate records, and ensuring strict compliance with safety and operational standards. Key Responsibilities Operational Excellence Ensure safe, reliable, and economical operation of the power plant, including proper shift handover and takeover. Manage and oversee shift operations effectively in the absence of the Shift In-Charge. Execute start-up, shutdown, and normal operations of engine sets, Steam Turbine Generator (STG), WHRB, auxiliaries, and associated plant systems. Perform fault diagnosis and take corrective actions to improve plant availability and reliability. Monitor, control, and analyse operating parameters of all running equipment; identify trends and recommend corrective measures. Monitoring, Reporting & Documentation Maintain all control room logbooks accurately, including: Engine Log Energy Meter Log HV/MV/LV Logs Substation Log Alternator Log DC Distribution Log, etc. Prepare and submit daily MIS, generation reports, outage/contracted reports, demand vs. load reports, plant shutdown/trip reports, incident reports, hot work permit reports, and other required documentation. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements Age 22 to 32 years Responsibilities & Context Classic Education Group is a leading student consultancy firm dedicated to guiding students through the complexities of university admissions. We pride ourselves on providing personalized support and expert advice to help students achieve their academic and career goals. Job Description: The Counsellor/senior counsellor is responsible for guiding students/clients through the overseas education or migration process. This role includes providing accurate program advice, assessing applicant eligibility, maintaining client communication, ensuring quality documentation, and achieving monthly conversion targets. The senior counsellor also supports junior counsellors through training, supervision, and performance guidance. Provide expert counselling to students regarding university options, course selection, and career pathways. Assist students in preparing and submitting university applications, scholarship applications, and visa documentation. Manage the end-to-end student journey: initial consultation, document assessment, SOP review, GTE, tests, interviews, personal statements & visa lodgement Guide students through the admission process, including application preparation, documentation, and submission. Conduct information sessions, seminars, and workshops for prospective students and parents. Respond to student inquiries through various communication channels, including in-person meetings, phone calls, and emails. Skills & Expertise Education Counseling Suggested by Immigration Consultant Student Counseling Student Visa Processing Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill,Tour allowance,Performance bonus Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for professional development and growth. job_title: Teaching Assistant (Aeronautical / BBA Aviation / English / Math/Mechanical)
job_description: Teaching Assistant (Aeronautical / BBA Aviation / English / Math/Mechanical) : City Tech IT Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List City Tech IT Teaching Assistant (Aeronautical / BBA Aviation / English / Math/Mechanical) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 4 Location: Dhaka (Uttara Sector 3) Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context United College of Aviation Science and Management (UCASM) United College of Aviation Science and Management (UCASM) is seeking motivated and dedicated individuals to join as Teaching Assistants (TA) for the following departments: Department of Aeronautical Engineering Department of BBA in Aviation Management Department of English Department of Mathematics Vacancy Details Position: Teaching Assistant (TA) Employment Status: Full-time / Part-time Job Location: Uttara, Dhaka Educational Requirements Aeronautical Engineering: Bachelor’s degree in Aeronautical or Mechanical Engineering . BBA Aviation Management: Bachelor’s degree in BBA (Aviation Management) or Management . English: Bachelor’s (Honors) or Master’s degree in English . Mathematics: Bachelor’s (Honors) or Master’s degree in Mathematics . Common Requirements: Minimum CGPA 3.00 in Bachelor’s degree. Strong academic background preferred. Fresh graduates are highly encouraged to apply. Job Responsibilities Assist faculty members in conducting lectures, tutorials, and laboratory sessions. Support students in academic tasks and project work. Help prepare course materials, assignments, and examination scripts. Maintain lab equipment (for Engineering & Science departments). If needed Classes also. Perform departmental academic and administrative tasks as assigned. Skills & Requirements Subject Knowledge: Deep understanding of core subjects (e.g., Aerodynamics for AE; Management for BBA; Linguistics/Literature for English; Calculus/Linear Algebra for Math). Communication: Strong presentation and communication skills in English and Bengali. Technical Skills: Basic knowledge of relevant software (e.g., MATLAB/SolidWorks for AE) is an advantage. Teamwork: Ability to work effectively in a team environment. Salary & Benefits Salary: Negotiable Other Benefits: As per college policy. Career Opportunities & Growth By joining UCASM as a Teaching Assistant, you will have access to the following professional benefits and growth paths: Pathway to Faculty Roles: High-performing candidates with the required qualifications will have the opportunity for promotion to Lecturer positions. Academic Research: Opportunities to collaborate with senior faculty members on Research & Publications in your respective field. Professional Training: Gain hands-on training in Modern Teaching Methodologies and Higher Education Management. I

Sales Executive - Heavy Equipment Machinery : Powervision Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Powervision Group Sales Executive - Heavy Equipment Machinery Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 4 Age: 23 to 33 years Location: Chattogram, Dhaka Salary: Tk. 15000 - 25000 (Monthly) Published: 18 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 23 to 33 years Responsibilities & Context Promote and sell heavy equipment machinery such as excavators, cranes, forklifts, dump trucks, and other construction equipment to corporate and individual clients. Identify potential customers, including construction companies, contractors, industrial clients, and government organisations. Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing and new clients to ensure repeat business. Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and monitor competitor activities. Prepare and deliver product presentations, demonstrations, and technical explanations to customers. Prepare quotations, negotiate prices, and finalise sales agreements in line with company policies. Achieve monthly and annual sales targets set by management. Coordinate with the technical/service team to ensure proper delivery, installation, and after-sales support. Follow up on customer payments and ensure timely collection. Maintain proper documentation of sales reports, client database, and sales forecasts. Participate in trade fairs, exhibitions, and promotional events to expand market presence. Provide regular feedback to management regarding market trends, customer requirements, and product improvements. Skills & Expertise Heavy Construction Equipment Heavy Equipment Sales & Marketing Suggested by Business Development Client Relationship Management Technical Sales Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Tour allowance,Mobile bill Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply.
